name: Braum
title: the Heart of the Freljord
lore: Blessed with massive biceps and an even bigger heart, Braum is a beloved hero of the Freljord. Every mead hall north of Frostheld toasts his legendary strength, said to have felled a forest of oaks in a single night, and punched an entire mountain into rubble. Bearing an enchanted vault door as his shield, Braum roams the frozen north sporting a mustachioed smile as big as his muscles—a true friend to all those in need.
blurb: Blessed with massive biceps and an even bigger heart, Braum is a beloved hero of the Freljord. Every mead hall north of Frostheld toasts his legendary strength, said to have felled a forest of oaks in a single night, and punched an entire mountain into...
allytips: Work with your allies to stack Concussive Blows, encourage them to basic attack marked targets.
Leap in front of squishy friends and shield them from projectiles with Unbreakable.
Glacial Fissure leaves a powerful slow zone, position it well to split teamfights and slow the enemy approach.
enemytips: Braum must land Winter's Bite or a basic attack to start Concussive Blows. If you get marked, exit combat range before getting hit 3 more times to avoid the stun.
Braum's ultimate has a long cast time, use that extra time to dodge. Walking over the frozen ground left behind will slow you, position so that you don't need to cross it.
Unbreakable gives Braum extremely strong directional defense, either wait until it is down or outposition the ability.

riot_spell_q.name: Winter's Bite
riot_spell_q.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [2.5% of Braum's Max Health] magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

riot_spell_w.name: Stand Behind Me
riot_spell_w.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Braum leaps to target allied champion or minion.

On arrival, Braum and the ally gain {{ f3 }} Armor and {{ f4 }} Magic Resist ({{ e4 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for {{ e1 }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Unbreakable
riot_spell_e.description: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Braum reduces incoming damage and blocks for allies behind him.
Braum raises his shield in a direction for {{ e2 }} seconds negating the damage of the next attack from that direction. Subsequent attacks deal {{ e3 }}% reduced damage.

Braum intercepts projectiles, causing them to hit him and be destroyed.

Braum gains {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for the duration.

riot_spell_r.name: Glacial Fissure
riot_spell_r.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line for {{ slowzoneduration }} seconds, slowing enemies above it by {{ movespeedmod }}%.

Enemies hit take {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for {{ slowdebuffduration }} seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.

riot_spell_i.name: Concussive Blows
riot_spell_i.description: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.

wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Braum's''' [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Winter's Bite|Braum}} each apply ''Concussive Blows'' to his target for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. Once the first stack has been applied, any allied [[champion]]'s basic attack on the target generates an additional stack.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{pp|3|changedisplay=true|1.25 to 1.75|1 to 13}} seconds and takes {{pp|26 to 196}} {{as|magic damage}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds, but during this immunity period affected targets instead take{{ft|20% of the trigger damage|{{pp|5.2 to 39.2}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} from '''Braum's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Winter's Bite|Braum}}.
wikia_skill_i1.customlabel: {{tt|Per-Target Cooldown|This is not affected by cooldown reduction. Begins after the target is stunned.}}

wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage. Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Braum''' propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.

wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Braum''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target ally, positioning himself between them and the closest enemy champion, gaining {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} for 3 seconds. If his target is a champion, they also receive the same bonuses.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Armor|{{ap|10 to 26}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10 to 16}}% '''bonus''' armor)}}}}{{st|Bonus Magic Resist|{{ap|10 to 26}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10 to 16}}% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.line_20: * If Braum casts ''Stand Behind Me'' on himself, it has no cast time and does not interrupt Braum's previous orders.
wikia_skill_w1.line_21: * ''Stand Behind Me'' can also be used on allied [[minion]]s and [[Champion summoned units|pets]], but cannot be used on wards.

wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Braum''' raises his shield in the target direction, creating a barrier that intercepts incoming non-[[turret]] enemy [[projectile]]s and reduces the [[damage]] he takes through the shield. The first instance of damage blocked by his shield is negated completely.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: While his shield is raised, '''Braum''' also gains {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and is {{tip|ghosted}}.
wikia_skill_e1.line_16: * ''Unbreakable'' has no cast time and does not interrupt Braum's previous orders.
wikia_skill_e1.line_18: ** {{sbc|Incoming:}} Damage sources coming from somewhere facing the shield. Those coming from behind will not be affected.
wikia_skill_e1.line_19: ** {{sbc|Projectiles:}} Sped up entities not classified as a unit (champions, minions, monsters, etc.)
wikia_skill_e1.line_20: ** {{sbc|Intercepting:}} A projectile hits Braum because he stands in front of the intended target. In addition to being redirected, an intercepted projectile is also destroyed '''after''' hitting Braum (although this is only applicable to pass-through projectiles)
wikia_skill_e1.line_21: * Moving units are not intercepted under any circumstance, including [[dash]]es. Champion-summoned units ({{ai|Command: Attack|Orianna}}, {{ai|Sapling Toss|Maokai}}, etc.) are not classified as units until they hit the ground and thus will interact with ''Unbreakable'' while en route.
wikia_skill_e1.line_22: * Projectiles whose effects trigger on collision will still happen upon hitting Braum - dealing damage, applying debuffs, creating slowing fields and marking the target as 'hit' for the purposes of {{ais|Zenith Blade|Leona}} [[dash]] or {{ais|Infected Cleaver|Dr. Mundo}} health refund.
wikia_skill_e1.line_23: * Abilities that deal area of effect damage on-collision will only damage Braum.
wikia_skill_e1.line_24: * If {{ai|Spinning Axe|Draven}} hits Braum, regardless if it's the first hit on the damage reduction or not, it will '''always''' bounce back and not be destroyed. This happens even if Braum intercepts the attack for an ally though the axe will bounce back from Braum and not the intended target.
wikia_skill_e1.line_25: * Projectile-based ground-targeted abilities that only occur upon successfully hitting the ground ({{ai|Miasma|Cassiopeia}}, {{ai|Aqua Prison|Nami}}, etc.) will apply their full effects to Braum but will be destroyed without affecting any other ally.
wikia_skill_e1.line_26: * Projectiles that '''cannot''' hit Braum or his allies (such as an enemy {{ai|Prismatic Barrier|Lux}}) will not be intercepted.<ref>[http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4464736&page=2#post46663454 Unbreakable's interaction with Lux's Prismatic Barrier]</ref>
wikia_skill_e1.line_27: * The '''damage reduction''' will affect any source of damage whose origin is in front of the shield. This includes...
wikia_skill_e1.line_30: ** Instantaneous skillshots ({{ai|Final Spark|Lux}}, {{ai|Lifeform Disintegration Ray|Vel'Koz}}, etc.)
wikia_skill_e1.line_31: ** Instantaneously-placed [[ground-targeted]] abilities ({{ai|Lay Waste|Karthus}}, {{ai|Rupture|Cho'Gath}}, etc.) relative to the ability's center and '''not''' the caster's
wikia_skill_e1.line_32: ** Point-blank areas-of-effect ({{ai|Tantrum|Amumu}}, {{ai|Time Bomb|Zilean}} not targeted at Braum, etc.)
wikia_skill_e1.line_33: * Instantaneous targeted abilities ({{ai|Transfusion|Vladimir}}, {{ai|Time Bomb|Zilean}} targeted at Braum, etc.) and {{tip|AoE DoT}} ({{ai|Tormented Shadow|Morgana}}, {{ai|Poison Trail|Singed}}) do not interact with ''Unbreakable''.
wikia_skill_e1.line_34: * The damage reduction only benefits Braum.
wikia_skill_e1.line_35: ** If {{ai|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} would path {{ci|Xin Zhao}} through ''Unbreakable'', only Braum will take reduced damage.
wikia_skill_e1.line_36: * {{tip|Damage over time}} is calculated per tick but be aware the full damage reduction will only apply to a single tick.
wikia_skill_e1.line_37: * If the damage mitigated by ''Unbreakable'' exceeds a minimum threshold it is represented with floating text similar to the damage mitigated by shields ('{{sbc|-X}}')
wikia_skill_e1.line_38: ** This floating text is always shown for the single fully-reduced damage source.
wikia_skill_e1.line_39: * For the purposes of abilities like {{ai|Backstab|Shaco}} Braum's facing direction is the direction he's moving in (''not the direction his face or the shield are looking in'')
wikia_skill_e1.line_40: ** This is a documented game engine limitation.
wikia_skill_e1.line_41: * If Braum is protected by a [[spell shield]] both it and the one-time-use full damage reduction can be consumed by a single blockable spell.
wikia_skill_e1.line_42: ** The one-time-use full damage reduction will not be consumed if the damage source is nothing but {{tip|true damage}}.

wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Braum''' leaps into the air and slams his shield into the ground, creating a fissure in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies as well as those around him.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: Enemy champions hit in the close vicinity are {{tip|airborne|knocked up}}, while enemies hit in the line are {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: If no enemy champions are hit in the point-blank area, the first enemy champion hit in the line is {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for the full duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description4: A field of ice then remains at the fissure's location for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies within, persisting for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
